citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 12/17/15 at 11:00 AM to do a facility inspection.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house. Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone numbers given by the licensee. Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Lundy Kendall, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 12/17/15 at  11:00 AM to do a facility inspection.
*  Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house.  Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone numbers given by the licensee.  Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.   
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Lundy Kendall, Animal Care Inspector
